languages.text: "Молчи, еретик. Или будешь омывать свои грехи кровавыми слезами, пока боль не заставит тебя возносить Императору мольбы о смерти".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Молчи, еретик. Или будешь омывать свои грехи кровавыми слезами, пока боль не заставит тебя возносить Императору мольбы о смерти. Но и тогда вместо нее буду приходить я и продолжать свою всенощную службу..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Be silent, heretic. Or you will find yourself washing away your blasphemies with tears of blood until the pain makes you beg the Emperor for death."
languages.original_text: "Молчи, еретик. Или будешь омывать свои грехи кровавыми слезами, пока боль не заставит тебя возносить Императору мольбы о смерти".

traits.locale_text: "Be silent, heretic. Or else you will be washing away your blasphemies with tears of blood until the pain makes you beg the Emperor for death."
"Be silent, heretic. Or else you will be washing away your blasphemies with tears of blood until the pain makes you beg the Emperor for death."

"Be silent, heretic. Or you will find yourself washing away your blasphemies with tears of blood until the pain makes you beg the Emperor for death."

languages.text: "Schweigt, Ketzer! Oder Ihr werdet Eure Gotteslästereien mit Bluttränen fortwaschen, bis der Schmerz Euch den Imperator um den Tod anflehen lässt."
languages.original_text: "Be silent, heretic. Or you will find yourself washing away your blasphemies with tears of blood until the pain makes you beg the Emperor for death."

traits.locale_text: "Schweigt, Ketzer! Oder Ihr werdet Eure Gotteslästereien mit Bluttränen fortwaschen, bis der Schmerz Euch den Imperator um den Tod anflehen lässt."

languages.text: « Silence, hérétique. Ou vous vous retrouverez à tenter de faire pardonner vos blasphèmes en pleurant des larmes de sang jusqu'à ce que la douleur vous contraigne à supplier l'Empereur d'abréger vos souffrances. »
languages.original_text: "Be silent, heretic. Or you will find yourself washing away your blasphemies with tears of blood until the pain makes you beg the Emperor for death."

traits.locale_text: « Silence, hérétique. Ou vous vous retrouverez à tenter de faire pardonner vos blasphèmes en pleurant des larmes de sang jusqu'à ce que la douleur vous contraigne à supplier l'Empereur d'abréger vos souffrances. »

languages.text: “闭嘴，异端分子，否则就用血泪洗刷你的亵渎行为吧，直到痛苦让你祈求帝皇赐你一死。”
languages.original_text: "Be silent, heretic. Or you will find yourself washing away your blasphemies with tears of blood until the pain makes you beg the Emperor for death."

traits.locale_text: “闭嘴，异端分子，否则就用血泪洗刷你的亵渎行为吧，直到痛苦让你祈求帝皇赐你一死。”

languages.text: «Silencio, hereje, o acabarás lavando tus blasfemias con lágrimas de sangre hasta que el dolor te haga suplicar la muerte al Emperador».
languages.original_text: "Be silent, heretic. Or you will find yourself washing away your blasphemies with tears of blood until the pain makes you beg the Emperor for death."

traits.locale_text: «Silencio, hereje, o acabarás lavando tus blasfemias con lágrimas de sangre hasta que el dolor te haga suplicar la muerte al Emperador».

languages.text: 「黙れ、異端者。さもなくば、自分の冒涜を血の涙で洗い流すことになり、その苦しみで皇帝陛下に死を乞うことになるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Be silent, heretic. Or you will find yourself washing away your blasphemies with tears of blood until the pain makes you beg the Emperor for death."

traits.locale_text: 「黙れ、異端者。さもなくば、自分の冒涜を血の涙で洗い流すことになり、その苦しみで皇帝陛下に死を乞うことになるだろう」

languages.text: "Sus kâfir. Yoksa acı seni İmparator'dan ölüm dileyecek hâle getirene kadar günahlarını kanlı gözyaşlarıyla yıkarken bulursun kendini."
languages.original_text: "Be silent, heretic. Or you will find yourself washing away your blasphemies with tears of blood until the pain makes you beg the Emperor for death."

traits.locale_text: "Sus, kâfir. Yoksa acı seni İmparator'dan ölüm dileyecek hâle getirene kadar günahlarını kanlı gözyaşlarıyla yıkarken bulacaksın kendini."
